description: This file sets up a knowledge base using URL data, configures an agent with OpenAI models and tools, and runs a sample query. It includes imports, object instantiations, and execution logic for a multi-agent system.

classes.name: UrlKnowledge
classes.description: Represents a knowledge base sourced from URLs, capable of loading and updating its data.

classes.name: LanceDb
classes.description: A vector database implementation using LanceDB for storing and searching embeddings.

classes.name: SearchType
classes.description: Enumeration for different search strategies within LanceDb.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An AI agent that interacts with tools and models to perform tasks.

classes.name: OpenAIEmbedder
classes.description: Embeds text using OpenAI's embedding models.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Represents an OpenAI chat model for conversational AI.

classes.name: KnowledgeTools
classes.description: A tool wrapper that provides knowledge base functionalities to the agent.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads or reloads the knowledge base, optionally recreating its data.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the agent's response to a given prompt, optionally streaming the output.
